item.description:
Thanks to everyone who came to the Meetup last week at Brownstone!

Here's our next Meetup: Saturday Night at Pho Republique. We are hoping this location will be more conducive to mingling. Hope you can join us for a drink or two on the 24th!

Directions:
On the T- a bit of a walk from Back Bay or Mass Ave stations (orange line), or take the Silver Line
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a name tag, or sign, or something!
item.name: Pho Republique
